entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
